acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

closeAuction(address).custom:events: Emits AuctionClosed event on successful close

params._minimumPoolBadDebt: Minimum bad debt in BUSD for a pool to start auction

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

params.bidBps: The bid percent of the risk fund or bad debt depending on auction type

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

restartAuction(address).custom:events: Emits AuctionRestarted event on successful restart

setPoolRegistry(address).details: After Pool Registry is deployed we need to set the pool registry address

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

params._minimumPoolBadDebt: Minimum bad debt in BUSD for a pool to start auction

AuctionClosed(address,address,uint256,ui.notice: Emitted when a auction is completed

AuctionRestarted(address).notice: Emitted when a auction is restarted

BidPlaced(address,uint256,address).notice: Emitted when a bid is placed

ConvertableBaseAssetUpdated(address,addr.notice: Emitted when convertible base asset address is updated

MinimumPoolBadDebtUpdated(uint256,uint25.notice: Emitted when minimum pool bad debt is updated

PoolRegistryUpdated(address,address).notice: Emitted when pool registry address is updated

minimumPoolBadDebt().notice: Minimum USD debt in pool for shortfall to trigger

nextBidderBlockLimit().notice: Time to wait for next bidder. wait for 10 blocks

placeBid(address,uint256).notice: Place a bid greater than the previous in an ongoing auction

setPoolRegistry(address).notice: Sets the pool registry this shortfall supports

startAuction(address).notice: Start a auction when there is not currently one active

updateMinimumPoolBadDebt(uint256).notice: Update minimum pool bad debt to start auction

waitForFirstBidder().notice: Time to wait for first bidder. wait for 100 blocks
